We want to grow substantially the data science team to scale up the modelling capabilities and the innovative solutions offered to external and internal clients. As a big player of services and information retrieval in many aspects of the Financial Markets

column1: THE ROLE AND ORGANIZATIONAL CONTEXT
The Hunger Monitoring Unit (HMU) in the Research Assessment and Monitoring (RAM) Division manages WFP’s global hunger monitoring activities
column3: WFP’s corporate real-time food security monitoring system. The HMU is responsible for the integration and holistic analysis of RAM’s information systems
column5: conflict and climate related data as well as assessment information. This requires the development of automated
column6: analytical pipelines and the continued institutionalization of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to continually improve hunger monitoring and predictive capacities.

column1: The HMU also manages the mobile Vulnerability Analysis and Mapping (mVAM) initiative which utilizes remote mobile data collection tools to monitor the food security situation of crisis affected populations. Core to this is the oversight of WFP’s near real-time or continuous food security monitoring systems which
column2: in partnership with multi-stakeholder food security platforms
column3: have been established in dozens of crisis-affected countries. Collecting data every day
column6: from data collected in call centres to data cleaning and analysis and finally results displayed in WFP’s HungerMapLIVE. These near real time systems provide daily estimates of the food security situation over the past 30 or 60 days. Currently
column7: these near real-time monitoring systems are in place in more than 36 countries.

column1: While expanding the real-time food security monitoring and the predictive analytics capacities

Job Description:

SiliconExpert Technologies represents the largest and most up-to-date component database in the electronics industry. Our now 400+ electronics and software engineers have digitized data on more than 1 billion electronic components across hundreds of product lines from over 15
column3: we help thousands of users worldwide to make end-of-life forecasts and
column5: to identify alternatives for parts that cannot be procured due to the general and pandemic supply shortages. SiliconExpert's customers include leading commercial and governmental OEMs

column1: The company employs more than 400 people worldwide. As part of a large American group of companies - Arrow Electronics - we are listed among the Fortune 500 on the stock exchange.
SiliconExpert Technologies is a highly digitized company that also drives its customers' digitization through Data-as-a-Service and Software-as-a-Service.
